channel.title: elisp on The Emacs Cat
channel.description: Recent content in elisp on The Emacs Cat

item.title: Some Excerpts From My Emacs Config
item.description:
I’m happy to be back after one year away and it feels great.

Below are some chaotic mini/micro – or even nano – excerpts from my ~/.emacs file I have been tuning in for 12 years. These days, I’m running Emacs 29.4 on Ubuntu (Pop!_OS) 22.04 and, rarely, on macOS.

item.title: Org Mode: Exporting Clock Tables
item.description: After reading a quite interesting post by Irreal on Org mode clock tables, I decided to share my — a bit specific — experience with the subject.

item.title: DMS To Decimal Degree Conversions And More
item.description: Working with satellite data I often have to convert a coordinate value or an angle value from the DMS notation (degree@minute’second") to a decimal degree in the floating point number format and vice versa.
